basics.label: Manager, Finance
basics.summary: Strategic and analytical finance and accounting professional with 15 years + experience of success in financial analysis, budget preparation and financial reporting. Very detail oriented and experienced in grant management, general ledger reconciliation, management and team- building skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Manage the finance function including budget preparation, cash flow management, training, compliance monitoring and more.
highlights: Prepare and analyze annual operating budgets for all units
Manage cash flow and banking functions
Coordinate the Passenger Facility Charge Program
Supervise, train and appraise Staff Accountant and Financial Analyst

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed financial reporting for capital projects, compliance to prevailing wage laws, collection and disbursement of Passenger Facility Charges and more.
highlights: Prepared quarterly reports for the Federal Aviation Administration
Ensured accuracy of compliance of prevailing wage laws by contractors and subcontractors
Monitored collection and disbursement of Passenger Facility Charges
